entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -40.7°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
